title: Greh njene majke
overview: Greh njene majke is another television adaptation of the novel Mir Jam, directed by Zdravko Šotra. The plot of the series is set in pre-war Serbia. Neda is a very beautiful, young girl, who lost her parents in a very tragic way due to the game of fate. This lonely, brave beauty begins her struggle for a place in society and the search for true love. Besides her cross, Neda must also suffer the sin that her mother committed in her youth. That sin will, in the end, lead this young girl to true love. Cast: Ivana Jovanović, Ivan Bosiljčić, Marija Vicković, Siniša Ubović.
